testcase.name: Test case 1: Positive test (valid username and password)
testcase.system-out: Given page header should display as "Test login"............................passed When enter "valid" username.................................................passed And enter "valid" password..................................................passed And click submit button.....................................................passed And valid header in landing page as "Logged In Successfully"................passed Then logout from app........................................................passed

testcase.name: Test case 2: Negative username test (incorrect username and valid password)
testcase.system-out: Given page header should display as "Test login"............................passed When enter "incorrect" username.............................................passed And enter "valid" password..................................................passed And click submit button.....................................................passed Then "Your username is invalid!" error should display.......................passed

testcase.name: Test case 3: Negative password test (valid username and incorrect password)
testcase.system-out: Given page header should display as "Test login"............................passed When enter "valid" username.................................................passed And enter "incorrect" password..............................................passed And click submit button.....................................................passed Then "Your password is invalid!" error should display.......................passed

testcase.name: Test case 4: Empty username and password
testcase.system-out: Given page header should display as "Test login"............................passed When click submit button....................................................passed Then "Your username is invalid!" error should display.......................passed
